name: Spectrum of a River
description:
Spectrum of  a River

A little sound toy that lets you explore the sounds of an orchestra next to a river. 

Controls are keys A through L. There's no goal or objective. Mess around and have fun making neat noise combinations. 

Made by Josh Hirshfield

Sounds used:

Birds: https://freesound.org/people/Baumstumpf/sounds/395938/

Rain: https://freesound.org/people/straget/sounds/531947/
